Ontologysim

  • Ontologysim: a Owlready2 library for applied production simulation
  • View page source

Ontologysim: a Owlready2 library for applied production simulationÂ¶

Ontologysim is an open-source production simulation framework, with an emphasis on modularized flexible library design and straightforward usability for applications in research and practice. Ontologysim is built on top of Owlready2 framework and requires Python >3.7.

Ontologysim follows a set of high-level design choices which differentiate it from other similar libraries:

  • the simulation can be saved at any time and started from a defined point

  • high degrees of freedom and possibilities due to the ontology
